it.unifi.rc.httpserver.m5765968.Test

Class MyHTTPOutputStreamTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unifi.rc.httpserver.m5765968.Test.MyHTTPOutputStreamTest

  • public class MyHTTPOutputStreamTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class tests the writing of a Request and / or a Reply on an OutputStream.
    Author:
    Mattia D'Autilia

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void newReply()
      Reads a reply from a basic string and recall the method to create the reply object.
      void newRequest()
      Reads a request from a basic string and recall the method to create the requested object.
      void setInputStreamReply(byte[] buf)
      Creates a object Reply from a basic string contained in the buffer in the form of bytes.
      void setInputStreamRequest(byte[] buf)
      Creates a object Request from a basic string contained in the buffer in the form of bytes.
      java.lang.String setOutputReply()
      Creates a Reply string, by writing with the HTTPOutputStream object.
      java.lang.String setOutputRequest()
      Creates a Requested string, by writing with the HTTPOutputStream object.
      void setUpOutputStream()
      Recalls the methods for reading a request and / or a reply.
      void testOutput()
      Tests the equality between the written request/reply and a requested/reply string.
